question.title: Will any Individual Neutral Athlete (Russian and Belarusian athletes) win any medals at the 2026 Winter Olympics?
question.description:
According to [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Individual_Neutral_Athletes_at_the_2026_Winter_Olympics#Competitors), Individual Neutral Athletes, who are individual athletes permitted to participate in the 2026 [Winter Olympics](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2026_Winter_Olympics) despite bans on Russia and Belarus, are participating in the following sports:

| Sport                     | Men (Belarus) | Men (Russia) | Women (Belarus) | Women (Russia) | Total  |
| ------------------------- | ------------- | ------------ | --------------- | -------------- | ------ |
| Alpine skiing             | 0             | 1            | 1               | 1              | 3      |
| Cross-country skiing      | 0             | 1            | 1               | 1              | 3      |
| Figure skating            | 0             | 1            | 1               | 1              | 3      |
| Freestyle skiing          | 0             | 0            | 3               | 0              | 3      |
| Luge                      | 0             | 1            | 0               | 1              | 2      |
| Short-track speed skating | 0             | 1            | 0               | 1              | 2      |
| Ski mountaineering        | 0             | 1            | 0               | 0              | 1      |
| Speed skating             | 0             | 0            | 1               | 2              | 3      |
| **Total**                 | **0**         | **6**        | **7**           | **7**          | **20** |

`{"format":"metac_reveal_and_close_in_period","info":{"post_id":42085,"question_id":41837}}`
question.resolution_criteria: This question resolves as **Yes** if any Individual Neutral Athletes ([AIN](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Individual_Neutral_Athletes_at_the_2026_Winter_Olympics)) win any gold, silver or bronze medals at the 2026 Winter Olympics. Question resolves according to the official [results](https://www.olympics.com/en/milano-cortina-2026/medals) or [credible sources](https://www.metaculus.com/faq/#definitions).
question.fine_print:
